title: Media Chapter Information

xdm:chapterAssetReference.title: Chapter Asset Reference
xdm:chapterAssetReference.description: Asset information about the chapter captured by the experience event.

@id.title: Chapter ID
@id.description: The auto-generated ID of the chapter.

xdm:name.title: Chapter Name
xdm:name.description: The friendly name of the chapter and/or segment.

xdm:duration.title: Chapter Length/Duration
xdm:duration.description: The length of the chapter, in seconds.

xdm:chapterAssetViewDetails.title: Chapter Asset View Details
xdm:chapterAssetViewDetails.description: View details for the chapter playback captured by the experience event.

xdm:chapterPosition.title: Chapter Position
xdm:chapterPosition.description: The position (index) of the chapter inside the content.

xdm:offset.title: Chapter Offset
xdm:offset.description: The offset of the chapter, in seconds, inside the content from the start.

xdm:loads.title: Loads
xdm:loads.description: Describes the intention to play a timed media asset. It does not measure success, as the user might abandon the content before the first frame is viewed.

xdm:completes.title: Completes
xdm:completes.description: Indicates if a timed media asset was watched to completion - this does not necessarily mean the viewer watched the whole video; viewer could have skipped ahead.

xdm:timePlayed.title: Time Spent
xdm:timePlayed.description: Describes the amount of time spent by a user on a specific timed media asset.

xdm:federated.title: Federated
xdm:federated.description: Indicates if an experience event was created through federation.
